tha-ap19:2.1: Kaṇikārapupphaṁ → kaṇikāraṁ pupphitaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap19:7.4: satthā loke bhavissati → eso buddho bhavissati (sya1ed, sya2ed); esa buddho bhavissati. (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
tha-ap19:9.3: Samantapāsādikattā → idaṁ pādadvayaṁ si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed potthakesu natthi, theragāthāaṭṭhakathāyameva
tha-ap19:10.4: savāhiniṁ → savāhanaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
